projectDescription: re wire old grade 2 listed building for renervation. making sure to work with local council to maintain local wild Bat population in area.

milestones.title: Project Initiation and Planning
milestones.description: Engage with local council and obtain necessary permits, Conduct initial site survey, Develop detailed project plan, Assemble project team
milestones.paymentDetails: : 10% of total project cost upon completion of milestone

milestones.title: Bat Habitat Preservation
milestones.description: Engage with local wildlife experts and council representatives, Develop and implement bat habitat preservation plan, Monitor and adjust plan as necessary
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of total project cost upon completion of milestone

milestones.title: Electrical System Assessment and Design
milestones.description: Conduct detailed assessment of existing electrical system, Design new electrical system, ensuring compliance with local regulations and preservation of historic features, Obtain necessary approvals for design
milestones.paymentDetails: : 25% of total project cost upon completion of milestone

milestones.title: Electrical System Installation
milestones.description: Procure necessary materials and equipment, Install new electrical system, Conduct regular inspections to ensure quality and compliance
milestones.paymentDetails: : 35% of total project cost upon completion of milestone

milestones.title: Project Closure
milestones.description: Conduct final inspections and obtain necessary approvals, Train building staff on new electrical system, Document project and hand over to building management, Conduct project review and lessons learned
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of total project cost upon completion of milestone
